title: Budget Deal Riles Market, Uber Settles With Waymo, Signs of Correction
itunes:title: Budget Deal Riles Market, Uber Settles With Waymo, Signs of Correction
description:
Liz Capo McCormick, Bloomberg News Bond Reporter, discusses how a budget deficit risks worsening the frenzy behind the global sell-off in stock markets. Matt Larson, Bloomberg Intelligence Litigation Analyst, talks about Uber agreeing to pay Waymo $245 million in equity to settle a lawsuit. Liz Ann Sonders, Chief Investment Strategist at Charles Schwab, explains the reasons behind the market correction. We Drive to the Close with Eric Schoenstein, Portfolio Manager at Jensen Investment Management. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” and Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson has the “Stock of the Day.” 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
